Dizzy Frog

Ultra Casual Color Hopping Game

A ultra casual color hopping game. Help Dizz the Dizzy Frog leap from lily pad to lily pad! If you're successful, Dizz changes colors and new lily pads appear in endless randomized patterns; the fun never stops! The more accurate your jump, the more points you gain! Play over and over again to build your high score!

Have some feedback or suggestions?
